pages.text: Skip to content BEERS CURRENTLY ON TAP Mexican Style Lager A Mexican lager–simple but luxurious. A lifestyle beer. Charleston’s top selling lager. 5.0% Blueberry Wheat Smooth American wheat made with German malts. A gentle touch of blueberry to finish. 5.2% Glitter Pony An essential Belgian tripel. A complex modern classic. Fruit. Spice. Deep golden. Deceptively drinkable. 7.5% Festbier Our favorite German beer style. Velvety malt character. Golden color. One of the finest lagers. Made with floor malted Bohemian pilsner, Vienna, and Munich malts. 6.0% ON THE BENCH Rally Cat Juicy IPA. Passionfruit, Mangos, Vanilla Beans, Lactose. Summit Extract, Centennial, Amarillo. 7.2% Star Boy A fruited Belgian style ale for the holidays and winter season. A perfect blend of raspberries and two different types of cherries take this beer to the top shelf. Deluxe Chocolate Stout American Stout showing off an abundance of classic malts and loaded with pure Ecuadorian cocoa. No sweeteners. No BS. 6.0% India Pale Ale A distinctly American IPA. Bright, fresh and clear. Low malt complexity and low bitterness. Layers of citrus and fruit with a nip of pine. Delight. 6.5% Hops – Chinook, Cashmere, El Dorado HOME CONTACT/INFO ORDER FOOD BEER SHOWS + EVENTS MERCH Facebook Instagram
